extendedInfo.description: "Wait For It..." for Android gives you a snappy interface to get real-time predictions of the buses, trains, and cable cars in San Francisco. Powered by NEXTbus, "Wait For It..." finds up-to-the-minute wait times for all Muni lines.Wait for it is now open source! github.com/bestrada/waitforit

reviews.title: Update for Ice Cream Sandwich Please!
reviews.comment: Hi Bryan,  Can you update your app for ice cream sandwich?  It is awesome, but I can\'t use with my new Nexus phone.  Thanks,  Andy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. In sync with Muni nextbus info and is easier than browsing nextbus site. GPS stop location guess and refresh button would rock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Accurate, reliable and very simple to use. I love this for getting around town. No need to have a car anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app and use it every day. I only wish it could bookmark my usual routes. Waiting anxiously for the update, but love it so far!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Times are totally inaccurate!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a few days now and four times the arrival times have been inaccurate (anywhere from 2-7 minutes). How frustrating is it to think you have 10 minutes to get to a bus stop for the next bus only to check 1 minute later and see it is arriving. Also you have to know what route - it won\'t find ones nearby you. Annoying to have to choose route... direction..  then the stop. If you don\'t know the muni system well this is totally unhelpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great interface! Would love to have notifications on when buses are arriving and use of gps/google maps to determine my location and bus stop
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For an app still in beta, this is very promising. Expect more features in future updates. Can\'t wait for the  finished product.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app haven\'t fail me yet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, fast and accurate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: love it. wish there was a way 2 save frequently used lines
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The UI is clean and compact. Needs other busses that serve this stop and option to just show times for nearby stops without all this tapping.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, quality interface. Tried a few before I settled on this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Basic interface, would be nice if it remembered my past searches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: sweeeeeet! Add a refresh button and it\'s a 5. eris
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thank you for this app, always 100% accurate, use it every day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect does exactly what I need it to do think you so much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, but tedious ui. You have to always start over. no ability to save favorite route orstop. Doesn\'t work after 7/8pm, which is weird.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Turns on GPS but doesn\'t use it. No easy refresh. Basic, but works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it and its sooo accurate and the app is so easy to use! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not always sort by next arrival time, no bookmarks for oft-used stops. Otherwise OK. N1/Froyo
reviews.author: A Google User
